short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn Japanese by immersing in Youtube videos. Import to HayaiLearn for AI explanations, popup dictionaries, and sentence mining.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn Japanese by turning Youtube videos into immersive learning materials. Find Japanese videos on Youtube, then import it to HayaiLearn to watch the video with dual subtitles, AI explanation and pop-up dictionary. 

Import requires having a subscription in HayaiLearn. After import is done, you can watch the video from any device: mobile, tablet, or desktop.

Sentence mine easily - save subtitles, take notes, and review them together with the videos with SRS. Organize your favorite videos into albums and easily search video-playable example sentences of any word that are taken from videos in your album.

Read the guide here: https://www.hayailearn.com/blog/hayailearn-importer-chrome-extension-guide
